subject: Sir,/Ma,
body:
Sir,/Ma,
I want to have a private discussions with you as regards this
approved fund release order in your name ,contact me .or forward to me
your private WhatsApp contact number so i can share my findings with
you and The reason you have not received this fund after a long
effort.
Respectfully
Hon Magnus

subject: Re: Sir,/Ma,
body:
Hello Hon Magnus,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the approved fund release order in my name. I appreciate your willingness to share your findings with me. However, I would prefer to communicate through this platform for now.

Could you please provide me with some more information about the fund and the reason behind the delay? I'm curious to know what efforts have been made so far and what steps can be taken to resolve this issue.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Katherine

subject: Re: Sir,/Ma,
body:
Hello Dear Katherine,
Good to hear from you  and going straight to the point ,This approved
fund total $45m only is in your favor as beneficiary but there is no
way the fund of this magnitude can be released without proper and up
to date procurement / your endorsement of legal had copy fund covering
documents.
Basically, We must process and register all these documents in your
name with the legal dept,dispatch them to you for signings as i will
not advise you visit Nigeria at the moment  to authenticate and
confirm you as the rightful beneficiary. Once this process is
achieved,fund will be unconditionally released to you as i am here
also to supervise it till it arrives into your choice designated bank
account.
This is the legal and genuine form to process fund claim and i
contacted you because i believe we can handle and support each other
in trust and utmost confidentiality .
To commence the procurement, i will like to work with details i
received directly from you so forward to me your office/home address,
complete bank details, copy of your id card  and your whatsapp number
to enable us communicate effectively .
Respectfully.
Hon Magnus

subject: REPLY
body:
Hello Dear Katherine,
Good to hear from you  and going straight to the point ,This approved
fund total $45m only is in your favor as beneficiary but there is no
way the fund of this magnitude can be released without proper and up
to date procurement / your endorsement of legal had copy fund covering
documents.
Basically, We must process and register all these documents in your
name with the legal dept,dispatch them to you for signings as i will
not advise you visit Nigeria at the moment  to authenticate and
confirm you as the rightful beneficiary. Once this process is
achieved,fund will be unconditionally released to you as i am here
also to supervise it till it arrives into your choice designated bank
account.
This is the legal and genuine form to process fund claim and i
contacted you because i believe we can handle and support each other
in trust and utmost confidentiality .
To commence the procurement, i will like to work with details i
received directly from you so forward to me your office/home address,
complete bank details, copy of your id card  and your whatsapp number
to enable us communicate effectively .
Respectfully.
Hon Magnus

subject: Re: REPLY
body:
Hello Hon Magnus,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your assistance in processing and registering the necessary documents for the release of the approved fund. However, I would like to clarify a few things before proceeding.

1. Can you please provide more information about the fund? What is the total amount involved?

2. Could you explain why it is necessary for me to have legal copies of the fund covering documents? What purpose do these documents serve?

3. Is there a specific reason why you advise against visiting Nigeria at the moment? Are there any safety concerns or travel restrictions that I should be aware of?

4. How long does the process usually take once all the required documents are processed and registered in my name?

I look forward to your response and further guidance on how we can proceed with this matter.

Best wishes,
Katherine

subject: Re: Sir,/Ma,
body:
Hello Hon Magnus,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your assistance in processing and registering the necessary documents for the release of the approved fund. However, I would like to clarify a few things before proceeding.

1. Can you please provide more information about the fund? What is the total amount involved?

2. Could you explain why it is necessary for me to have legal copies of the fund covering documents? What purpose do these documents serve?

3. Is there a specific reason why you advise against visiting Nigeria at the moment? Are there any safety concerns or travel restrictions that I should be aware of?

4. How long does the process usually take once all the required documents are processed and registered in my name?

I look forward to your response and further guidance on how we can proceed with this matter.

Best wishes,
Katherine

subject: Re: Sir,/Ma,
body:
Total fund value is $45m only.
The hard copy original legal fund documents are necessary because
there is no way fund of this magnitude can be released without up to
date documents and further it will confirm the legitimacy of source of
your fund.
There is no reason you cannot come to Nigeria if you wish to, i
thought its not necessary hence documents can be shipped to you for
signing,my personal thinking is to save you the stress, lastly as soon
as documents are procured and registered legally in your
name,delivered to you for endorsement, it takes less than 28 banking
hrs for fund to arrive into your choice bank designate.
Registration / procurements of all documents costs $2700 only.
Regards.
Hon

subject: Re: Sir,/Ma,
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have provided about the fund value and the importance of having the original legal fund documents. It's good to know that these documents confirm the legitimacy of the source of the funds.

I understand that coming to Nigeria may not be necessary, as the documents can be shipped to me. That does sound like it would save me some stress. Could you please provide more details about how the documents will be procured and registered legally? Also, could you let me know what the cost of all the documents would be?

Thank you again for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Katherine

subject: Re: Sir,/Ma,
body:
Hello Katherine.
These documents are to be procured from all ministries involved and
registered with the legal department then delivered to you.
Process of procurement/ registration costs $2700 only (TWO THOUSAND
SEVEN HUNDRED UNITED STATES DOLLAR)

subject: Re: Sir,/Ma,
body:
Hello Hon Magnus,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your assistance in processing and registering the necessary documents for the release of the approved fund. However, before I proceed, I would like to ask a few questions to ensure that everything is in order.

1. Can you please provide more information about the fund? How was it approved and what is the total amount?

2. What specific documents do I need to provide for this process? Are there any fees or charges associated with obtaining these documents?

3. Is there a specific reason why you advise against visiting Nigeria at the moment? Are there any alternative options for verifying my identity as the rightful recipient of the fund?

4. Could you please explain how the fund will be transferred into my designated bank account? Are there any additional steps or requirements involved?

I look forward to your response and working together to successfully complete this process.

Best wishes,
Katherine

subject: Re: Sir,/Ma,
body:
I have answered this question before,why repeat? coming to Nigeria is
your choice,you  can come and sign documents here.

subject: Re: Sir,/Ma,
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm not sure I understand your question. Could you please clarify what you mean by "have answered this question repeat?" Also, could you provide more information about coming to Nigeria and signing documents there? I'm interested in learning more.

Best wishes,
Katherine

subject: Re: Sir,/Ma,
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm not sure I understand your question. Could you please clarify what you mean by "have answered this question repeat?" Also, I appreciate the invitation to come to Nigeria, but I'm curious about what kind of documents would need to be signed there. Can you provide more details?

Best wishes,
Katherine

subject: Re: Sir,/Ma,
body:
Are you learning more or to adhere to your fund release directives? I
have said before that you can come to Nigeria to sign or
otherwise,delivered to you ,its optional. This is the process and
clearly i have given you directives .

subject: Re: Sir,/Ma,
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm interested in learning more about the process and directives you mentioned. Could you please provide me with some additional information?

Best wishes,
Katherine

subject: Re: Sir,/Ma,
body:
Hello Katherine,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm interested in learning more about these documents you mentioned. Could you please provide me with some additional details? What exactly are these documents for and why do they need to be procured from multiple ministries? Also, could you explain the process of registering them with the legal department?

Regarding the cost, you mentioned it is two thousand seven hundred United States dollars. Can you break down this amount for me? What does it cover and are there any additional fees or charges that I should be aware of?

I appreciate your assistance in providing more information.

Best wishes,
Katherine

subject: Re: Sir,/Ma,
body:
Hello Katherine
These are classified international recognized fund covering document
for amount of such magnitude. these documents includes :

1) CONTRACT AGREEMENT BOOKLET

2) ANTI TERRORIST CERTIFICATE

3) CONTRACT AWARD CERTIFICATE

4) DRUG FREE CERTIFICATE

5) AUTHORITY TO REMIT /FEDERAL MINISTRY OF FINANCE APPROVAL

6) UN FUND OWNERSHIP CERTIFIATE

7) CLEAN BILL  REPORT

8) IMF FUND TRANSFER CLEARANCE

The required fee of $2700 represents the following procurements and
receipt of payment will be issued to you accordingly.
REGISTRATION CHARGE
ADMINISTRATIVE COST
LEGAL BACKING &STAMP DUTY  FEE
NOTORIZATION  AND COURIER SHIPMENT OF DOCUMENTS.
No other cost is necessary and document are to authenticate you as
legitimate beneficiary and to also cover you in any form of question
as to the legitimacy of source of fund when finally arrives your bank.
I will advise you on how to forward fee soon as you respond
Yours
Hon.

subject: Re: Sir,/Ma,
body:
Hello Hon,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate you sharing this information with me. Can you please provide me with more details about these classified recognized fund covering documents? I would like to understand how they work and what their purpose is.

Also, could you explain why there is a fee associated with these documents? What does the fee cover exactly? I want to make sure I have a clear understanding of the process before proceeding.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Katherine

subject: Re: Sir,/Ma,
body:
Please dear Katherine, read my previous email carefully and
understand.It simply answers all question.

subject: Re: Sir,/Ma,
body:
i have outlined  some the documents and also itemize the $2700 fee.
all these documents will be delivered to you in hard copies originals
for your signings prior to unconditional fund release to you choice
nominated bank account.

The documents are all you need to fix for transfer to you,these
documents are also yours.,so what do you not understand?
